RelatedSentence: Orange Armenia telecom , a subsidiary of France Telecom , has announced today the names of the 3 winners of the Hurry to become Orange offer .

A1: Portability www.1qayl.am website launched by Orange
RelatedSentence: Everyone , who preregistered from March 11 to April 1 on the special Mobile Number Portability www.1qayl.am website launched by Orange , and ported his number to the Orange network till the end of April , has had the chance to receive a special gift - iPhone 5C .

Avetik Ayvazyan , Hasmik Babajanyan and Hayk Harutyunyan are the lucky ones who have received their gifts today in Orange premises .

The launch of the Mobile Number Portability has been a very important step for the Armenian telecom market , undertaken by the Public authorities and the RA PSRC , as from the 1 st of April the customers have the full freedom to choose the operators they prefer , without having the inconvenience to change their numbers .
